creator.name: Classis Amsterdam van de Nederlandse Hervormde Kerk
creator.name_english: Classis Amsterdam of the Dutch Reformed Church
creator.his_func: The Dutch Reformed ministers in the West Indian colonies were appointed by the classis in Amsterdam. After being stationed overseas the ministers stayed in close contact with the classis and regularly reported about their congregations. There was a separate commission of deputies entrusted with the contacts with the churches abroad.
